professionalSummary: Senior Software Engineer with 16+ years of experience building rich performing applications using React, Redux, Angular, Node JS, Express and Spring boot in an agile environment. Working as Team Lead and responsible for team management, client interactions, application design, development best practices, testing, code review, security and CI/CD pipeline using AWS and Azure cloud platforms.

responsibilities: Design, architect, develop presentation layers using React Native, Expo, Jest and React testing library which interacts with Rest Services
Worked on Azure deployment which has CI/CD pipelines
Leading a team of 10 members and worked closely with UI/UX designer to gather requirements for building rich applications
Create and implement smooth, clean animations to attract and retain customers on multiple platforms

Design, architect, develop and test high performing presentation layers using React, Highcharts, Vue JS, Material UI toolkit, Jest and React testing library which interacts with WebSocket APIs and Rest Services
Worked on Kubernetes container deployment which has CI/CD pipelines
Responsible for the Solution and technical design of entire platform and integration with various other systems
Mentoring other team members, reviewing their deliverables and an overall responsibility for the quality and timeliness of the team's deliverables
Review all technical decisions/designs and provide constructive feedback and Present solutions to stakeholders
Designed and developed the application to be responsive for desktop, mobile and tablets using Twitter Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript
Involvement in all stages of Software development life cycle including Analysis, development, Implementation, testing and support
Developed single page web application using JavaScript framework
Wrote a combination of jQuery plugins, as well as completely custom JavaScript to build a bleeding-edge, AJAX-driven user interface
Involved in writing application-level code to interact with APIs, Web Services using AJAX, JSON and XML
Designed and developed intranet web applications using JSP, JavaScript and CSS
Responsible for design and development of web pages using HTML, CSS, JavaScript

keyHighlights: Expertise in React, React Native, and modern JavaScript frameworks
